name: Stockholm
description:
Stockholm is a first-person 3D escape room game. The game begins with the player trapped in a house. In this escape game, the player must use their wits and limited resources to find a way out before their captor, Ted Bungy, returns. There are two difficulties: 5 minutes to finish easy and 2 minutes to complete hard. Good luck escaping the clutches of Bungy! 

This game was made in a team of 4 for a game development class. Hope you guys enjoy!
